current.homepage_main_heading: Buy Ubuntu Advantage security and patching
current.homepage_sub_heading: Get critical CVE fixes for Ubuntu 14.04, live kernel patching, tech support and more for your Ubuntu systems.
current.home_includes_copy:
• Enterprise-grade securityAccess to the latest software and our proactive support services, including Landscape and the Canonical Livepatch Service.
  • IP legal assurance The Ubuntu Assurance Programme that provides indemnification against claims of intellectual property infringement.
  • Certified technology All major software vendors, hardware vendors, system integrators and cloud providers have certified their technologies on Ubuntu.
  • OpenStack and Kubernetes included Full coverage for your open infrastructure, with OpenStack, Kubernetes, Ceph and Linux support included.
  • 24/7 phone and web supportAround-the-clock coverage for Ubuntu deployments all over the world with the ability to track progress through an online portal.
  • Technical Knowledge BaseThe Ubuntu support Knowledge Base, exclusively available to UA Infrastructure subscribers, is an extensive library of articles on technical issues.
current.home_featured_heading: Security, compliance and support to improve efficiency while reducing complexity and cost.
current.home_featured_description: UA Infrastructure helps leading organisations around the world to manage their Ubuntu deployments in production. It includes:
current.home_landscape_description: With the Landscape systems management tool, you can automate updates and manage physical, virtual and cloud-based systems from a single interface. It's easy to set up, easy to use and requires no special hardware. It features:
current.home_landscape_list: Management at scale | Role-based access | Deploy or rollback security updates | Informative monitoring | Compliance reports
current.home_left_column_heading: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS Trusty Tahr Extended Security Maintenance
current.home_left_column_description: Extended Security Maintenance (ESM) is now available for Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, providing security fixes for the kernel and essential user space packages, included in Ubuntu Advantage for Infrastructure.
current.home_mid_column_heading: Canonical consolidates open infrastructure support and security offerings
current.home_mid_column_description: Canonical announced Ubuntu Advantage for Infrastructure, a consolidated enterprise security, compliance and support offering that covers the full range of open source infrastructure capabilities.
current.home_right_column_description: Full enterprise support is available for Kubernetes 1.14 using kubeadm deployments, its Charmed Kubernetes, and MicroK8s, its popular single-node deployment of Kubernetes.
current.home_customers_heading: Ubuntu Advantage for Infrastructure Customers
current.home_canonical_description: Canonical is the publisher of Ubuntu and the leading provider of Linux enterprise services for Ubuntu server, cloud and desktop deployments. Ubuntu delivers reliability, performance and interoperability to cloud and scale-out environments. With developers, engineers and support staff all over the world, Canonical is uniquely positioned to help its partners and enterprise customers make the most of Ubuntu.
current.cart_promo_copy: The Ubuntu Advantage store is certified Level 1 PCI DSS compliant. Purchase with confidence.
current.tac_copy: I confirm acceptance to the terms of the services agreement for and on behalf of the company identified in the order.
current.footer_help_content: If you just need support for yourself, you can get help from the community, join a forum, or take a look at our official documentation. Learn about community support â€º Report a bug on this site
current.footer_contact_content: If you have problems accessing your account, please contact us online.

current.collection_sub_heading: From basic office tasks to complex development work, Ubuntu Advantage gives your organisation all the support you need to deploy and manage Ubuntu.
